Original: Since you guys just started your
journey through the skies, let me
warn you about two things.
[Page]
First... the [Color:5]dragon[Color:0]! If you see it
in the sky, don't do anything crazy.
[Page]
Just coming near that enormous, bright
red fire dragon will provoke it into
tearing you to tiny pieces!
[Page]
Second... the [Color:5][Enemy1:125][Color:0]! It's so cute that
no amount of skill will result in
anything but disaster!
[Page]
It's said that whoever catches one is
guaranteed good luck... But even if
you find one, it fluffily runs away!
[Page]
Do they hate me that much!?
